titles.title: A bill to authorize the establishment of the Charles Pinckney National Historic Site in the State of South Carolina, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.
Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks. Hearings held.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, OMB.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 2/17/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands for the establishment of the Charles Pinckney National Historic Site, South Carolina. Requires the Secretary to report, within three years, to the appropriate congressional committees a general management plan for such site. Authorizes appropriations.
